infos.value: Just what are you going to do to me!?
Hmph. And so the mask slips.
Lord Mont...reserve your attention for the Fennes soldiers.
They're... Even with Oldoa bested, they don't intend to withdraw?
I guess she wouldn't make much of a hostage. If that's the case, now is the time...
Wait. I doubt even that would spur the soldiers to retreat.
So I guess that means...there's only one choice left.
